full_text: MATERIALS 1 skein of Purl Soho’s Nigh DK , 100% cashmere. Each skein is 199 yards/ 55 grams; approximately 199 total yards required. We used Heirloom White, Nickel Gray, Raindrop Blue, Morning Sky, and Harbor Blue. US 4 (3.5 mm), 16-inch circular needles A stitch marker GAUGE 28 stitches and 37 rounds = 4 inches in stitch pattern NOTE: We used almost the entire skein for this cowl. To avoid running out of yarn, be sparing with your tails and check your gauge. Be sure to block your swatch, too… After all, cashmere does tend to relax! SIZE Finished Dimensions: Approximately 18 inches circumference x 9½ inches tall Designed by Purl Soho designer, Laura Ferguson .
name: Ravelry: Near + Dear Cowl pattern by Purl Soho
